data.title: Cannabis Cultivation Informational Workshop and Permitting Event
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
data.excerpt: State Water Board staff will be hosting an Informational Workshop on the proposed updates to the Cannabis Cultivation Policy and Cannabis Cultivation General Order on November 8, 2018 from 4:00 p.m.

content.rendered:
State Water Board staff will be hosting an Informational Workshop on the proposed updates to the Cannabis Cultivation Policy and Cannabis Cultivation General Order on November 8, 2018 from 4:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m. at the River Lodge Conference Center in Fortuna, CA. There will be a presentation on the proposed updates and an opportunity to ask questions.

Permitting staff will also be available beginning at 2:00 p.m. to help you file for your Small Irrigation Use Registration and apply for coverage under the Cannabis Cultivation General Order.

Please see the attached flyer for more information or visit our webpage at:  www.waterboards.ca.gov/cannabis

Please direct all questions regarding the proposed updates as indicated below:

Cannabis Policy – (916) 341-5363 or CannabisWR@waterboards.ca.gov

Cannabis Cultivation General Order – (916) 341-5580 or DWQ.Cannabis@waterboards.ca.gov

We also encourage you to follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter for news, photos, videos, workshop schedules, and other information related to the Water Boards Cannabis Program.
